>>What is the order quantity that will maximize profit? <<
= 183 +-1
[explanation] Use the Newsboy's model to get the order quantity. \(P(D\leq q)\geq \frac{r-c}{r-s}=\frac{(4.5+8)-8}{4.5+8}=0.36\) D is normally distributed with mean of 200 and standard deviation of 50. \(P(\frac{d-\mu}{\sigma}\leq \frac{Q-\mu}{\sigma})=P(Z\leq -0.35)=0.3632>0.36\) \(\frac{Q-\mu}{\sigma}=\frac{Q-200}{50}=-0.35\) \(q=183\) [explanation]
